Computer.name: HW Server Farm #274
Computer.encryptedFile:
Congrats, you've decrypted all the files... Alright, so you want to know the final password to complete the mission? Well, would it annoy you if I told you it had nothing to do with the password to this file?
The password you are looking for... is infact, all the passwords you've discovered put together... or rather, just the 3rd of the 3 passwords in each group. Ready? Go for it! As a further note however, make sure to seperate each password with an '_' underscore character.
As a bonus however, just to confuse you even more... These 4 simple words must be in REVERSE order to when you discovered them. Really hope you were keeping note of those passwords ;)
